SETTINGS.SimpleMacroShorthandL: Enable a shortened macro syntax which allows referencing attributes directly, for example @str instead of @attributes.str.value. Disable this setting if you need the ability to reference the full attribute model, for example @attributes.str.label.
SETTINGS.SimpleInitFormulaL: Enter an initiative formula, such as d20+@dex
battlehammer.NotifyGroupAttrDuplicate: Attribute group already exists as an attribute.
battlehammer.NotifyGroupAlphanumeric: Attribute group names may not contain spaces or periods.
battlehammer.NotifyAttrDuplicate: Attribute key already exists as a group.
battlehammer.DeleteGroupContent: Do you wish to delete this group? This will delete the following group and all attributes included in it:
